co.cask.cdap.api.plugin

Interface PluginContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CustomActionContext, HttpServiceContext, MapReduceContext, MapReduceTaskContext<KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>, SparkClientContext, WorkerContext, WorkflowContext

    @Beta
public interface PluginContext
    Provides access to plugin context when a program is executing.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PluginProperties getPluginProperties(String pluginId)
      Gets the PluginProperties associated with the given plugin id.
      <T> Class<T> loadPluginClass(String pluginId)
      Loads and returns a plugin class as specified by the given plugin id.
      <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId)
      Creates a new instance of a plugin.
      <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId, MacroEvaluator evaluator)
      Creates a new instance of a plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getPluginProperties

        PluginProperties getPluginProperties(String pluginId)
        Gets the PluginProperties associated with the given plugin id.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        Returns:
        the PluginProperties.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin

      • loadPluginClass

        <T> Class<T> loadPluginClass(String pluginId)
        Loads and returns a plugin class as specified by the given plugin id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        Returns:
        the resulting plugin Class.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin

      • newPluginInstance

        <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId)
                    throws InstantiationException
        Creates a new instance of a plugin. The instance returned will have the PluginConfig setup with PluginProperties provided at the time when the PluginConfigurer.usePlugin(String, String, String, PluginProperties) was called during the program configuration time.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the plugin being specified by the arguments
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - if failed create a new instance
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin

      • newPluginInstance

        <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId,
                      MacroEvaluator evaluator)
                    throws InstantiationException,
                           InvalidMacroException
        Creates a new instance of a plugin. The instance returned will have the PluginConfig setup with PluginProperties provided at the time when the PluginConfigurer.usePlugin(String, String, String, PluginProperties) was called during the program configuration time. If a plugin field has a macro, the parameter evaluator is used to evaluate the macro and the evaluated value is used for the plugin field.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        evaluator - the macro evaluator that's used to evaluate macro for plugin field if macro is supported on those fields.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the plugin being specified by the arguments
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - if failed create a new instance
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin
        InvalidMacroException - if there is exception during macro evaluation
